snippet: Chen Guangcheng, a self-taught lawyer and advocate for the handicapped, has managed to evade China's attempts to isolate him by posting video messages online.
abstract: Chen Guangcheng, a self-taught lawyer and advocate for the handicapped, has managed to evade China's attempts to isolate him by posting video messages online.

headline.main: A Chinese Dissident's Smuggled Video Messages
